mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_IDX, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_DEL_STATUS FROM MU_FAQ WHERE FAQ_DEL_STATUS IS NULL
SELECT FAQ_IDX, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_DEL_STATUS FROM MU_FAQ WHERE FAQ_DEL_STATUS IS NULL AND FAQ_CATEGORY = '관람'
SELECT FAQ_IDX, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_DEL_STATUS FROM MU_FAQ WHERE FAQ_DEL_STATUS IS NULL AND FAQ_CATEGORY = '교통'
